fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
* During the day choose a player to challenge to a dice game, Roll 3 d6 and whoever rolls the most gets a use one of their limited use abilities or can use their ability twice the next night if they dont have a limited ability.
* Reroll your defense or attack randomly (0 uses)
* Deal an attack to someone (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
* At the start of the game you gain defense, It can be negative which negates up to that level of defense: Negative powerful (20%), Negative Basic (30%), None, (40%), Basic (5%), Powerful (4%), Invincible (1%)
* At the start of the game you gain attack, It can be negative which acts as defense but is treated as an attack (triggers autovests and abilities that activate on attack), Negative Powerful (25%), Negative Basic (25%), None (40%), Basic (8%), Powerful (2%)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Town Wincon + Reroll any one of your stats atleast 3 times
